description:
The Siena International Photo Awards is a prestigious photography contest that receives entries from over 100 countries around the world. Results for the 2016 competition have just been announced and below you can find a collection of our favorite award winners and honorary mentions.锡耶纳国际摄影奖是一个久负盛名的摄影比赛，接收来自世界各地100多个国家的作品。2016年摄影作品评比结果刚刚揭晓，你可以从下方找到我们最喜欢的获奖作品集及荣誉奖作品集。

The pictures span countless countries including India, China, Bangladesh, Turkey, Cuba, Myanmar and Bahrain. Leyla Emektar won first place for the travel category for her beautiful image of a strawberry-picker walking between colorful greenhouses in Turkey, while first place for the Open Color category went to Danny Yen Sin Wong for his shot of a Vietnamese woman making a traditional fishing net. The winning photographs are currently on display at the Siena Art Photo Travel Festival, a month-long exhibition held in the city of Siena, Italy. The exhibition runs from October 29 to November 30.这些照片中包含无数国家的作品，如印度、中国、孟加拉国、土耳其、古巴、缅甸以及巴林。莱拉·埃默科塔获得了旅游类一等奖，她的照片拍摄了土耳其草莓采摘者穿行于绚丽多彩的温室时的美丽场景。而开放式色彩类一等奖由丹尼·叶森翁获得，他拍摄了一名越南女子编制一张传统渔网的场景。目前，获奖摄影作品都在锡耶纳艺术写真旅游节上展览。该展会在意大利锡耶纳举行，为期一个月，10月29日开始，11月30日结束。

Phan Rang Fishing Net Making, Vietnam (1st Place In Open Color Category)越南潘阳：编制渔网（开放式色彩类第一名）

Smile (Honorable Mention In People And Portrait Category)微笑（人物肖像类荣誉奖）

Strawberry Greenhouses, Turkey (1st Place In Travel Category)土耳其：草莓温室（旅游类第一名）

Sprinkle Net (Remarkable Award In Open Color Category)撒网（开放式色彩类卓越奖）

The Power Of Nature, Sicily (1st Place In Nature Category)西西里岛：自然的力量（自然类第一名）

Mangrove, Cuba (Honorable Mention In Nature Category)古巴：红树林（自然类荣誉奖）

Floating Market, Malaysia (3rd Place In Travel Category)马来西亚：水上市场（旅游类第三名）

The Way Back, Iraq (Honorable Mention In Open Color Category)伊拉克：归途（开放式色彩类荣誉奖）

The Storyteller, China (Honorable Mention In Travel Category)中国：说书人（旅游类荣誉奖）

Living Place, Tibet (Honorable Mention In Architecture Category)西藏：居住区（建筑类荣誉奖）

Tree Of Life (Remarkable Award In Open Color Category)生命之树（开放式色彩类卓越奖）

Gaming During Recess (Remarkable Award In Open Monochrome Category)课间游戏（开放式单色类卓越奖）

Makkah, Mecca, Saudi Arabia (2nd Place In Open Color Category)沙特阿拉伯：麦加（开放式色彩类第二名）

Fun In Childhood (Remarkable Award In Open Color Category)童年乐趣（开放式色彩类卓越奖）

Night Phantoms (Remarkable Award In Open Color Category)黑夜幻象（开放式色彩类卓越奖）

Typhoon (Honorable Mention In Open Color Category)台风（开放式色彩类荣誉奖）

Prayers On The Road, Bangladesh (Honorable Mention In Travel Category)孟加拉国：路上的祈祷者（旅游类荣誉奖）

Rural Portuguese People - Beginning Of The Day (Remarkable Award, People And Portrait Category)葡萄牙乡村人民-一天的开始（人物肖像类卓越奖）

Taj Mahal Side Mosque (Remarkable Award In Architecture Category)泰姬陵旁边的清真寺（建筑类卓越奖）

Red Zone, China (Honorable Mention In Open Color Category)中国：红色地带（开放式色彩类荣誉奖）

title: 2016锡耶纳国际摄影奖最佳旅游照片，美翻！

description:
Charles and Camilla toasted their 'Utopian' Poundbury estate as the Queen gave the development her royal seal of approval during an anniversary tour.当英女王在一次周年巡游中正式同意开发庞德伯里庄园的时候，查尔斯和卡米拉为他们的“乌托邦”（庞德伯里）举杯。

The Duchess of Cornwall poured a half pint of beer for her husband this afternoon as they marked the official opening of The Duchess of Cornwall Inn in the experimental Dorset village.今天下午康沃尔公爵夫人为丈夫倒了半品脱啤酒，以此表示位于多赛特实验村的康沃尔公爵夫人酒吧正式开业。

The Duke of Edinburgh also perused the ales on tap.爱丁堡公爵也仔细查看了可以随时取用的啤酒。

Her Majesty then returned to Waitrose, where she browsed the cheese aisle and studying the cereals on offer.然后女王回到了维特罗斯（超市），在那儿她粗略地看了一下奶酪陈列区并查看了一下出售中的谷类食品。

Camilla speaks with Waitrose cafe staff during a visit to Poundbury, which is owned by the Duchy of Cornwall.在参观庞德伯里的时候，卡米拉跟维特罗斯咖啡馆的职员说了会儿话，庞德伯里也是康沃尔公爵的直辖领地。

In a tour that marks 20 years since building of Poundbury began, the Queen also visited the pub on site where locals gathered.在庞德伯里创建20周年巡游中，女王也参观了当地人聚集的酒吧。

The Queen, the Duke of Edinburgh, The Duchess of Cornwall and Prince Charles watch on as the statue of the Queen Mother is unveiled in the centre of Poundbury.当女王母亲的雕像在庞德伯里中心揭幕的时候，女王、爱丁堡公爵、康沃尔公爵夫人以及查尔斯王子都注视着这个仪式。

The Queen and the Duke of Edinburgh arrived at Prince Charles's 'Utopian' Poundbury village for a tour Waitrose and the village pub.女王和爱丁堡公爵到达了查尔斯王子的“乌托邦”庞德伯里，在那里他们参观了维特罗斯和乡村酒吧。

After touring Queen Mother Square, the Queen and the Duke visited the local Waitrose supermarket and attended a private reception.游览了太后广场之后，女王和公爵一起来到当地的维特罗斯超市，参加了一个私人招待会。

The statue (left) is based on the Queen Mother when she was younger. She is pictured right, walking in procession to the service of the Most Noble Order of the Garter at St. George's Chapel, Windsor Castle.左侧雕像是以女王母亲年轻时的样子为基础的。右侧是女王母亲的照片。照片中展示的是在温莎城堡的圣乔治礼拜堂中以最高贵的礼遇为女王母亲授予嘉德勋位的仪式，而女王母亲正走在游行的队伍中。

The Royal Pavilion, which will house luxury apartments, takes its name from one of the Queen Mother's racehorses.皇家穹顶宫（英皇阁）中建有豪华公寓，这座宫殿是以女王母亲的一匹赛马的名字来命名的。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 英女王造访康沃尔公爵的“乌托邦”
